alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Carroll; Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rock Island, Whiteside, Henry, south central Carroll, western Bureau, eastern Scott and southeastern Clinton Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 845 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Long Grove to near Warner to near Altona. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Osborn around 850 AM CDT. Galva, Princeton and McCausland around 855 AM CDT. Geneseo and Cordova around 900 AM CDT. Kewanee, Camanche, Atkinson and Low Moor around 905 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Albany, Annawan, Hooppole, East Clinton, Clinton, Fulton, Garden Plain, Prophetstown and Sheffield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 74 in Iowa between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 296 and 306. Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 1 and 50. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 8 and 26. Interstate 88 between mile markers 1 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bureau; Carroll; Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside
